column4: Hi i need help removing my flash player and getting the right one installed. Im running ubuntu 9.04
yeah got that one but its messing my sound up and doesnt play right
ok first you have to uninstall it
how i did sudo apt-get remove flashplugin-nonfree and i still had it
try the purge option with apt-get
removed all packages, which one should i install?
the non-free flash has been removed now?
ok, go to adobe.com and dl the .gz file for v. 10 flashplayer (linux) and save it to your home dir
right when i goto a site that i want to use flash on it tells me to click here to download package. It gives me 3 options
anyone advise me on best Flash option to install. Just tried the nonfree version and it didnt work so well
do you want to install it or not?
